solution_line_template: First find the total number of pies Marcus bakes: {pies_per_batch} pies/batch * {num_batches} batches = <<{pies_per_batch}*{num_batches}={total_pies_baked}>>{total_pies_baked} pies
Then subtract the number of pies Marcus drops: {total_pies_baked} pies - {pies_dropped} pies = <<{total_pies_baked}-{pies_dropped}={pies_left}>>{pies_left} pies
